synopsis.text: Tooru-san, a magician with a scarred hand, saves Yuumi Takeshita from a truck during a stormy day when they were young. Fast forward eight years, Yuumi is now a rookie policewoman at Tawagoto precinct, eager to catch criminals. On her first assignment, she mistakes Tooru for a pickpocket and apprehends him, recognizing him from the scar on his hand. To apologize, Yuumi invites him on a date, where they cross paths with the real pickpocket. Together, they team up to catch the thief, and Yuumi continues to seek Tooru's help on various odd tasks. Along with her childhood friend Sarasa Maijima, Yuumi balances her police duties with hanami festivals, sumo contests, and magical events.
